metadata.title: Algeria Eye ‚Äî Discover Algeria
metadata.description: Explore Algeria's 48 wilayas. Book hotels, restaurants, tours, and unique experiences across the country.

aboutPage.title: About Algeria Eye
aboutPage.subtitle: Redefining Tourism in Algeria
aboutPage.missionDesc: To showcase the hidden beauty of Algeria to the world, providing a seamless platform for tourists to discover authentic experiences and for locals to share their heritage.
aboutPage.whatWeDoDesc: We bridge the gap between travelers and the rich cultural tapestry of Algeria. From booking luxury hotels to finding local guides for Sahara expeditions, we handle it all.

hero.title: Discover the Beauty of Algeria
hero.subtitle: From Saharan dunes to Mediterranean shores ‚Äî explore 48 unique wilayas through handpicked hotels, tours, and local experiences.

home.wilayasSubtitle: Each wilaya holds its own story, waiting to be discovered
home.featuredWilayasSubtitle: Handpicked wilayas you'll fall in love with
home.categoriesSubtitle: Find exactly what you're looking for
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for an unforgettable Algerian journey
home.feature1Desc: Every property is vetted and verified by our team to ensure quality and authenticity.
home.feature2Desc: Compare prices across hundreds of listings to find the perfect match for your budget.
home.feature3Desc: Discover hidden gems curated by locals who know Algeria's beauty inside out.
home.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of hosts earning income by listing their properties on Algeria Eye.
